name: Tasty Turkey Muffins
ingredients: 1/3 cup shallots or onion, minced, 1 1/2 ounces

instructions.en: Brown the turkey with celery, onion, and a little salt and pepper until celery is tender; drain off any grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte morku s zelerom, cibuľou a trochou soli a korenia, kým zeler nezmäkne; zlejte prebytočný tuk.
instructions.ja: 七面鳥のひき肉をセロリ、玉ねぎ、少量の塩コショウと一緒にセロリが柔らかくなるまで炒めます。余分な脂は切ります。

instructions.en: Beat the eggs, cream, pepper, and chicken seasoning in a mixing bowl.
instructions.sk: V miske vyšľahajte vajcia, smotanu, korenie a kuracie korenie.
instructions.ja: ボウルで卵、生クリーム、コショウ、チキンシーズニングを混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Divide the turkey mixture among 6 well-greased muffin cups. Top with cheese.
instructions.sk: Rozdeľte morčaciu zmes do 6 dobre vymastených muffinových formičiek. Posypte syrom.
instructions.ja: 七面鳥の混ぜ物を6つのよく油を塗ったマフィン型に分け入れます。チーズをのせます。

instructions.en: Slowly pour the egg mixture evenly over each muffin cup.
instructions.sk: Pomaly nalejte vaječnú zmes rovnomerne na každú muffinovú formičku.
instructions.ja: 卵の混ぜ物をゆっくりと各マフィン型に均等に注ぎます。

instructions.en: Bake at 350ºF for 20-25 minutes, until set and lightly browned.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri 175°C 20-25 minút, kým sa neustália a mierne nezhnednú.
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで20〜25分、固まって軽く茶色くなるまで焼きます。

notes: Makes 6 muffins. Can be frozen. If chicken seasoning is unavailable, use 1/4 teaspoon poultry seasoning and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
